channel.title: Orb draining
channel.description:
Client : 317 PI (even though PI isn't a client)
I added new HP and Prayer orbs, like this - http://gyazo.com/14c315f5a821939de584f76cde5371bc they are added correctly, but they don't drain... how can I make them drain? ik theres a lot of tutorials out there for this but I tried 3 and they all didn't work ;(
